title: verification template
extract: Verification and validation are independent procedures that are used together for checking that a product, service, or system meets requirements and specifications and that it fulfills its intended purpose. ... In practice, as quality management terms, the definitions of verification and validation can be inconsistent.
extract_html: Verification and validation are independent procedures that are used together for checking that a product, service, or system meets requirements and specifications and that it fulfills its intended purpose. ... In practice, as quality management terms, the definitions of verification and validation can be inconsistent.
